table.name: vtiger_hrm_employee
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hrm_employee` ( `employid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `firstname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `lastname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `employ_gender` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `user_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `date_of_birth` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `mobile` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `position` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `employ_marital_status` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `country` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `flag` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `candidate_id` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `action` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `start_work_date` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `employ_number` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `official_date` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `desired_salary` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `probality_period` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `official_salary` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `private_email` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`employid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_hrm_employcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hrm_employcf` ( `employid` int(19) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`employid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
